Articles.Content:
Im not sure if this is the right place to put this thread, but is there a mod that adds enviormental effects?

Something like tidal waves on laythe, or sandstorms on duna, Not a mod that adds clouds (already got that)
EVE modpack did add Duna sandstorms, so I would check to see if someone got that working in 1.04

Not currently, as far as I know.

The terrain is procedurally generated, I think it would be hard to make waves.

Not currently, as far as I know.

The terrain is procedurally generated, I think it would be hard to make waves.

damn, huge wave son laythe like that scene in interstellar would be awesome.

At the moment, most of the 'Visual Enhancements' mods are undergoing surgery post-1.0. This leaves things thin on the ground for visual mods, with the options either being 'botch the pre-1.0 version' or 'wait for 'soon' to arrive'. I think you'll struggle with finding a 'waves' mod (I've not heard of one, so let me know if you do! though I'm pretty sure it's impossible) but there are a number of mods that provide full visual enhancement:

KSPRC Renaissance Compilation, by Proot

AstronomerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Visual Pack, by Astronomer

There are more, but these are some of the best (IMO). Buried in these forums are the solutions to get them working in 1.04.

There is also a mod that adds wind and some other environmentals to KSP:

Kerbal Weather Systems, by SilverFox

Hope that helps!
